img.alt: A number line from 0 to 20. An arc starts at 0 and jumps 7 units to the right, landing on 7. A second arc starts at 7 and jumps 9 units to the right, landing on 16.

qti-content-body.p: Correct! Starting at 7 and adding 9 gives 16.
Not quite. Look at the number line. The first jump takes you to 7. The second jump is 9 units long, so it takes you from 7 to 16. Therefore, 7+9=16.
